biotools.summary: The Orphanet Rare Disease Ontology (ORDO) - structured vocabulary for rare diseases, capturing relationships between diseases, genes and other relevant features. It integrates a classification of rare diseases, relationships (gene-disease relations, epiemological data) and connections with other terminologies (MeSH, UMLS, MedDRA), databases (OMIM, UniProtKB, HGNC, ensembl, Reactome, IUPHAR, Geantlas) and classifications (ICD10).

bioschemas.name: ORDO
